comments.content:
Those of you on the Facebook group will be getting a reminder shortly. ;-)

Remember, there's loads of room, so bring your friends and other type, ah, types.

Cash bar....

It's important to note that the location is different from previous meetings. The Kensington Pub gets too busy at Christmas time, so we've moved around the corner and down a block.

The selection of beers isn't as diverse as the K-Pub. But we can drink Coronas and eat nachos and talk about rotunda and fraktur, and watch all the traffic leaving the downtown core.

Just bumping this to remind people that the meeting is tomorrow evening.

Bring something for Show & Tell.  
Bring a typography book to share.  
Bring a friend.  
Got a label collection or a beer coaster collection? Bring samples!
